TopicTitle: Pteron Micro Shuttle and rescue vehicle Beta download available(9/9/2014)

Articles.Content:
Hi all, sorry about the lack of progress/updates and thanks for the continued interest. RL has been taking all my attention for the last couple of months. I am strictly a paper and pen guy with no modelling coding skills so I really need someone to take the completed assets over the line and into the game! I will PM Blackheart to see if the great work he has done on this could be handed over to someone who doesn't have quite so many projects on the go.

So in short I looking for people to help get this out there in the velvety blackness of space. I am here to marshal and tweak configs but I need some people who understand the arcane nature of unity.

BTW "taking pre-orders" is classic marketing speak, translation "we have no idea when it will be ready"
I'm just quiet here, I don't want to get everybody's hopes up but I did send files to sirkut and nazari. This is literally not abandoned but very slow.
I was just wondering about this little project what with all the other, and rather disappointing, attempts to create something like this that have been popping up all over the place.
I'm taking a look at the assets. Update Soon Ã¢â€žÂ¢

HOLY CRAP I WANT

caps
I'll be signing up for preorders now after seeing that teaser!!!!!!!!
Awesome Nazari? I unfortunately don't have time to look at the files in depth for about 2 weeks so it's nice to see you got a handle on it.
When will we get a release of this?

http://i.imgur.com/duHDFQW.png

How's the EVA doing?
looking good!
Looks awesome!
Give us a peak to the IVA pls
Any news???

I have the files and nazari reported to have done it but since I am not the proponent of this project, with respect to Sage, we probably want him to be the one to have the say on this project. We rarely hear from him though so as for him, I don't know.

Hello all, I am just testing the version passed to me by Nazari. I will spend a few hours checking it over and writing an amusing part description and then I will post a beta version for testing. Later today probably.

Thanks for the patience everyone.

The struggle is almost over comrades!

Great to hear about the progress

Hello all, I am just testing the version passed to me by Nazari. I will spend a few hours checking it over and writing an amusing part description and then I will post a beta version for testing. Later today probably.

Thanks for the patience everyone.

How's your plan with the engines by the way Sage?

How's your plan with the engines by the way Sage?

The O-10 RCS motors work like a charm. With the internal RCS tankage it has about 1100 DV

Try to use most of the fuel in orbit, coming down with full fuel tanks can make for hard landings.

Edited September 4, 2014 by Sage Sagan
Wow, just found this searching for a small shuttle... seems I got the timing right
I'm really looking forward to this - it's adorable

I'm really looking forward to this - it's adorable

Thanks dude, you make some great stuff so that means a lot. I am looking back through my sketch book and I remember that I was thinking of a .625m single kerbal re-entry pod..Now I see that your F.T.T pack is going to have .625m EVA pod type thingy I really want to resurrect the single seat re-entry pod idea.

Would a single or 2 part lifting body .625m pod be of any interest to the wider community?

Download Beta Version

https://www.dropbox.com/s/x8xq1nd21f1oaoz/Pteron.2.rar?dl=0

So this is the early version, all configs subject to change etc.

Known issues:

No I.V.A.

Right Flap is un-textured

No Hatch texture

The original idea was that kerbals access the shuttle through the rear docking port and would only use the hatch when they have safely cras..I mean landed.

I think for simplicity it might be best to have a small door in the current position of the hatch on the model.

As I said earlier, be aware of how much fuel is left when coming in to land. If you come in heavy and steep you will crash.

I am thinking of moving it down the tech-tree a little...thoughts?

Finally a huge thank you to all those who have given their time and skill to bring this little beauty to fruition.

Blackheart

Daemoria

Nazari

Take a bow

Edited September 4, 2014 by Sage Sagan

Well, from the pictures, I got to admit: this is already smaller than I had in mind (but still awesome!)-So I'm not too sure if a smaller one is needed...

Edit: Starting up KSP now, I'll update again once I tried this a bit

Edit 2: Testing on Kerbin (yes, I know) show that this is absolutely uncontrollable in Atmosphere... even with RCS- all it can do is roll...

Edit 3: Or it does NOT roll.... i dont get it, but right now its quite unstable

Edited September 4, 2014 by CrazyOdd

It's called a micro shuttle for a reason! but really just finish this one before starting anything else

Edited September 4, 2014 by montyben101
